Sentencas: A novel solid oxide electrolysis cell based on high-performance and CO2-tolerant materials, a BaCe0.3Zr0.5Dy0.2O3- proton-conducting electrolyte and a Nd1.95Ba0.05NiO4+ oxygen electrode, was successfully fabricated and tested.
Titulo: CO2-promoted hydrogen production in a protonic ceramic electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Unusual characteristics leading to enhanced improvement were observed for this cell when the reducing atmosphere was enriched with CO2.
Titulo: CO2-promoted hydrogen production in a protonic ceramic electrolysis cell

Sentencas: A possible mechanism by which this behaviour may be explained is proposed.
Titulo: CO2-promoted hydrogen production in a protonic ceramic electrolysis cell
